claw.shenron.transformation

Class DependentTransformationGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.shenron.transformation.TransformationGroup
      • claw.shenron.transformation.DependentTransformationGroup

  • public class DependentTransformationGroup
extends TransformationGroup
    An dependent transformation group check whether it can be transformed with another pending transformation in the pipeline. Each transformation are applied only once.
    Author:
    clementval

    • Method Detail

      • applyTranslations

        public void applyTranslations(XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                              Translator translator)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: TransformationGroup
        Apply all transformation stored in this group. Method transform from each transformation is called.
        Specified by:
        applyTranslations in class TransformationGroup
        Parameters:
        xcodeml - The XcodeML on which the transformations are applied.
        translator - The translator used to applied the transformations.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - if transformation cannot be applied.
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        TransformationGroup.applyTranslations(XcodeProgram, Translator)

      • add

        public void add(Transformation transformation)
        Add a new transformation in the group. As transformation are dependent between each other, the position in the list is determined by the transformation's start line.
        Overrides:
        add in class TransformationGroup
        Parameters:
        transformation - The transformation to be added.
        See Also:
        TransformationGroup.add(Transformation)
